snippet: “Death of a Salesman” and Audra McDonald are locks, but not so for other Tony Award nominees, according to the polling for an unusually competitive contest.
abstract: Race for best musical between Broadway shows Newsies and Once is only one of an unusually high number of unpredictable contests at the 2012 Tony Awards; other major categories have many of the 851 Tony voters struggling with the problem of choosing a favorite from several strong contenders.
lead_paragraph: “Death of a Salesman” and Audra McDonald are locks, but not so for other Tony Award nominees, according to the polling for an unusually competitive contest.

headline.main: That Tony Pool: Few Sure Bets
headline.print_headline: That Tony Pool: Few Sure Bets
